<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.UpdateSetHierarchyPreviewAgainVisible</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Used by Run Preview Again for Hierarchy UI Action and Notice business rule</description> <name>UpdateSetHierarchyPreviewAgainVisible</name> <script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetHierarchyPreviewAgainVisible = Class.create(); UpdateSetHierarchyPreviewAgainVisible.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractUpdateUIActionUtil, { initialize: function() { },
_userHasAccess: function(gr) { return ((gr.state == 'previewed' || gr.state == 'partial') && gr.remote_base_update_set == gr.sys_id && this._isCurrentDomainSafe() && gr.canWrite() && SNC.UpdateSetAccessUtil.checkDelegatedDeveloperAccessToHierarchy(gr.sys_id)); },
type: 'UpdateSetHierarchyPreviewAgainVisible' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-01-09 17:51:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>99de159447103200a03a19fbac9a713f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UpdateSetHierarchyPreviewAgainVisible</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Update Set Batching" source="com.glide.system_hierarchy_update_set">8ab2450f6d6620100acb70b3534330a6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_99de159447103200a03a19fbac9a713f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-01 22:23:15</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>534</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
